verses.text: And \w Abimelech|strong="H0040"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jerubbaal|strong="H3378"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* to \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w* unto his \w mother’s|strong="H0517"\w* \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, and \w communed|strong="H1696"\w* with them, and with all the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of his \w mother’s|strong="H0517"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Speak|strong="H1696"\w*, I pray you, in the \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* of all the \w men|strong="H1167"\w* of \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w*, Whether \add is\add* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* for you, either that all the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jerubbaal|strong="H3378"\w*, \add which are\add* threescore and \w ten|strong="H7657"\w* \w persons|strong="H0376"\w*, \w reign|strong="H4910"\w* over you, or that \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w reign|strong="H4910"\w* over you? \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* also that I \add am\add* your \w bone|strong="H6106"\w* and your \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*.\f + \fr 9.2 \ft Whether…: Heb. What is good? whether, etc\f*

And his \w mother’s|strong="H0517"\w* \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* of him in the \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* of all the \w men|strong="H1167"\w* of \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w* all these \w words|strong="H1697"\w*: and their \w hearts|strong="H3820"\w* \w inclined|strong="H5186"\w* to \w follow|strong="H0310"\w* \w Abimelech|strong="H0040"\w*; for they \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, He \add is\add* our \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*.\f + \fr 9.3 \ft to follow: Heb. after\f*

And they \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* him threescore and \w ten|strong="H7657"\w* \add pieces\add* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* out of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Baal-berith|strong="H1170"\w*, wherewith \w Abimelech|strong="H0040"\w* \w hired|strong="H7936"\w* \w vain|strong="H7386"\w* and \w light|strong="H6348"\w* \w persons|strong="H0582"\w*, which \w followed|strong="H3212"\w* \w him|strong="H0310"\w*.

And he \w went|strong="H0935"\w* unto his \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* at \w Ophrah|strong="H6084"\w*, and \w slew|strong="H2026"\w* his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jerubbaal|strong="H3378"\w*, \add being\add* threescore and \w ten|strong="H7657"\w* \w persons|strong="H0376"\w*, upon \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w stone|strong="H0068"\w*: notwithstanding yet \w Jotham|strong="H3147"\w* the \w youngest|strong="H6996"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jerubbaal|strong="H3378"\w* was \w left|strong="H3498"\w*; for he \w hid|strong="H2244"\w* himself.

And all the \w men|strong="H1167"\w* of \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w* gathered \w together|strong="H0622"\w*, and all the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Millo|strong="H4407"\w*, and \w went|strong="H3212"\w*, and \w made|strong="H4427"\w* \w Abimelech|strong="H0040"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, by the \w plain|strong="H0436"\w* of the \w pillar|strong="H5324"\w* that \add was\add* in \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w*.\f + \fr 9.6 \ft plain: or, oak\f*

¶ And when they \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \add it\add* to \w Jotham|strong="H3147"\w*, he \w went|strong="H3212"\w* and \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* in the \w top|strong="H7218"\w* of \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Gerizim|strong="H1630"\w*, and lifted \w up|strong="H5375"\w* his \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, and \w cried|strong="H7121"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, \w Hearken|strong="H8085"\w* unto me, ye \w men|strong="H1167"\w* of \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w*, that \w God|strong="H0430"\w* may \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* unto you.

The \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* went \w forth|strong="H1980"\w* \add on a time\add* to \w anoint|strong="H4886"\w* a \w king|strong="H4428"\w* over them; and they \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the olive \w tree|strong="H2132"\w*, \w Reign|strong="H4427"\w* thou over us.

But the olive \w tree|strong="H2132"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Should I \w leave|strong="H2308"\w* my \w fatness|strong="H1880"\w*, wherewith by me they \w honour|strong="H3513"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* and \w man|strong="H0582"\w*, and \w go|strong="H1980"\w* to be \w promoted|strong="H5128"\w* over the \w trees|strong="H6086"\w*?\f + \fr 9.9 \ft go…: or, go up and down for other trees\f*
And the \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to the fig \w tree|strong="H8384"\w*, \w Come|strong="H3212"\w* thou, \add and\add* \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* over us.

But the fig \w tree|strong="H8384"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Should I \w forsake|strong="H2308"\w* my \w sweetness|strong="H4987"\w*, and my \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w fruit|strong="H8570"\w*, and \w go|strong="H1980"\w* to be \w promoted|strong="H5128"\w* over the \w trees|strong="H6086"\w*?
Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* the \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* unto the \w vine|strong="H1612"\w*, \w Come|strong="H3212"\w* thou, \add and\add* \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* over us.

And the \w vine|strong="H1612"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Should I \w leave|strong="H2308"\w* my \w wine|strong="H8492"\w*, which \w cheereth|strong="H8055"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* and \w man|strong="H0582"\w*, and \w go|strong="H1980"\w* to be \w promoted|strong="H5128"\w* over the \w trees|strong="H6086"\w*?

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* all the \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* unto the \w bramble|strong="H0329"\w*, \w Come|strong="H3212"\w* thou, \add and\add* \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* over us.\f + \fr 9.14 \ft bramble: or, thistle\f*

And the \w bramble|strong="H0329"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w trees|strong="H6086"\w*, If in \w truth|strong="H0571"\w* ye \w anoint|strong="H4886"\w* me \w king|strong="H4428"\w* over you, \add then\add* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \add and\add* put your \w trust|strong="H2620"\w* in my \w shadow|strong="H6738"\w*: and if not, let \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* come \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of the \w bramble|strong="H0329"\w*, and \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* the \w cedars|strong="H0730"\w* of \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w*.

Now therefore, if ye have \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w truly|strong="H0571"\w* and \w sincerely|strong="H8549"\w*, in that ye have made \w Abimelech|strong="H0040"\w* \w king|strong="H4427"\w*, and if ye have \w dealt|strong="H6213"\w* \w well|strong="H2896"\w* with \w Jerubbaal|strong="H3378"\w* and his \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and have \w done|strong="H6213"\w* unto him according to the \w deserving|strong="H1576"\w* of his \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*;

(For my \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* for you, and \w adventured|strong="H7993"\w* his \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w far|strong="H5048"\w*, and \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* you out of the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Midian|strong="H4080"\w*:\f + \fr 9.17 \ft adventured…: Heb. cast his life\f*

And ye are risen \w up|strong="H6965"\w* against my \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, and have \w slain|strong="H2026"\w* his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, threescore and \w ten|strong="H7657"\w* \w persons|strong="H0376"\w*, upon \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w stone|strong="H0068"\w*, and have made \w Abimelech|strong="H0040"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of his \w maidservant|strong="H0519"\w*, \w king|strong="H4427"\w* over the \w men|strong="H1167"\w* of \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w*, because he \add is\add* your \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*;)

If ye then have \w dealt|strong="H6213"\w* \w truly|strong="H0571"\w* and \w sincerely|strong="H8549"\w* with \w Jerubbaal|strong="H3378"\w* and with his \w house|strong="H1004"\w* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \add then\add* \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w* ye in \w Abimelech|strong="H0040"\w*, and let him also \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w* in you:

But if not, let \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* come \w out|strong="H3318"\w* from \w Abimelech|strong="H0040"\w*, and \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* the \w men|strong="H1167"\w* of \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w*, and the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Millo|strong="H4407"\w*; and let \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* come \w out|strong="H3318"\w* from the \w men|strong="H1167"\w* of \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w*, and from the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Millo|strong="H4407"\w*, and \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* \w Abimelech|strong="H0040"\w*.

And \w Jotham|strong="H3147"\w* ran \w away|strong="H1272"\w*, and \w fled|strong="H5127"\w*, and \w went|strong="H3212"\w* to \w Beer|strong="H0876"\w*, and \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* there, for \w fear|strong="H6440"\w* of \w Abimelech|strong="H0040"\w* his \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*.
¶ When \w Abimelech|strong="H0040"\w* had \w reigned|strong="H7786"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* over \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*,

Then \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* an \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* between \w Abimelech|strong="H0040"\w* and the \w men|strong="H1167"\w* of \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w*; and the \w men|strong="H1167"\w* of \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w* dealt \w treacherously|strong="H0898"\w* with \w Abimelech|strong="H0040"\w*:

That the \w cruelty|strong="H2555"\w* \add done\add* to the threescore and \w ten|strong="H7657"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jerubbaal|strong="H3378"\w* might \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, and their \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* be \w laid|strong="H7760"\w* upon \w Abimelech|strong="H0040"\w* their \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*, which \w slew|strong="H2026"\w* them; and upon the \w men|strong="H1167"\w* of \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w*, which \w aided|strong="H2388"\w* him in the \w killing|strong="H2026"\w* of his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*.\f + \fr 9.24 \ft aided…: Heb. strengthened his hands to kill\f*

And the \w men|strong="H1167"\w* of \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w* \w set|strong="H7760"\w* liers in \w wait|strong="H0693"\w* for him in the \w top|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*, and they \w robbed|strong="H1497"\w* all that \w came|strong="H5674"\w* along that \w way|strong="H1870"\w* by them: and it was \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w Abimelech|strong="H0040"\w*.

And \w Gaal|strong="H1603"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ebed|strong="H5651"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* with his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, and went \w over|strong="H5674"\w* to \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w*: and the \w men|strong="H1167"\w* of \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w* put their \w confidence|strong="H0982"\w* in him.

And they went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* into the \w fields|strong="H7704"\w*, and \w gathered|strong="H1219"\w* their \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w*, and \w trode|strong="H1869"\w* \add the grapes\add*, and \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w merry|strong="H1974"\w*, and \w went|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of their \w god|strong="H0430"\w*, and did \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* and \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*, and \w cursed|strong="H7043"\w* \w Abimelech|strong="H0040"\w*.\f + \fr 9.27 \ft merry: or, songs\f*

And \w Gaal|strong="H1603"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ebed|strong="H5651"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Who \add is\add* \w Abimelech|strong="H0040"\w*, and who \add is\add* \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w*, that we should \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* him? \add is\add* not \add he\add* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jerubbaal|strong="H3378"\w*? and \w Zebul|strong="H2083"\w* his \w officer|strong="H6496"\w*? \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w Hamor|strong="H2544"\w* the \w father|strong="H0001"\w* of \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w*: for why should we \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* him?

And would to God this \w people|strong="H5971"\w* were \w under|strong="H5414"\w* my \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*! then would I \w remove|strong="H5493"\w* \w Abimelech|strong="H0040"\w*. And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Abimelech|strong="H0040"\w*, \w Increase|strong="H7235"\w* thine \w army|strong="H6635"\w*, and come \w out|strong="H3318"\w*.

¶ And when \w Zebul|strong="H2083"\w* the \w ruler|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Gaal|strong="H1603"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ebed|strong="H5651"\w*, his \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* was \w kindled|strong="H2734"\w*.\f + \fr 9.30 \ft kindled: or, hot\f*

And he \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* unto \w Abimelech|strong="H0040"\w* \w privily|strong="H8649"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Behold, \w Gaal|strong="H1603"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ebed|strong="H5651"\w* and his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* be \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w*; and, behold, they \w fortify|strong="H6696"\w* the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* against thee.\f + \fr 9.31 \ft privily: Heb. craftily or, to Tormah\f*

Now therefore \w up|strong="H6965"\w* by \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, thou and the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \add is\add* with thee, and lie in \w wait|strong="H0693"\w* in the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*:

And it shall be, \add that\add* in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, as soon as the \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* is \w up|strong="H2224"\w*, thou shalt rise \w early|strong="H7925"\w*, and \w set|strong="H6584"\w* upon the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*: and, behold, \add when\add* he and the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \add is\add* with him come \w out|strong="H3318"\w* against thee, then mayest thou \w do|strong="H6213"\w* to them as \w thou|strong="H3027"\w* shalt find \w occasion|strong="H4672"\w*.\f + \fr 9.33 \ft as thou shalt…: Heb. as thine hand shall find\f*

¶ And \w Abimelech|strong="H0040"\w* rose \w up|strong="H6965"\w*, and all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \add were\add* with him, by \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, and they laid \w wait|strong="H0693"\w* against \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w* in \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w companies|strong="H7218"\w*.

And \w Gaal|strong="H1603"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ebed|strong="H5651"\w* went \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, and \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* in the \w entering|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*: and \w Abimelech|strong="H0040"\w* rose \w up|strong="H6965"\w*, and the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \add were\add* with him, from lying in \w wait|strong="H3993"\w*.

And when \w Gaal|strong="H1603"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Zebul|strong="H2083"\w*, Behold, there \w come|strong="H3381"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* from the \w top|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*. And \w Zebul|strong="H2083"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Thou \w seest|strong="H7200"\w* the \w shadow|strong="H6738"\w* of the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* as \add if they were\add* \w men|strong="H0582"\w*.

And \w Gaal|strong="H1603"\w* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* \w again|strong="H3254"\w* and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, See there \w come|strong="H3381"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* by the \w middle|strong="H2872"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and \w another|strong="H0259"\w* \w company|strong="H7218"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* along by the \w plain|strong="H0436"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w Meonenim|strong="H6049"\w*.\f + \fr 9.37 \ft middle: Heb. navel\f*\f + \fr 9.37 \ft Meonenim: or, the regarders of times\f*

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w Zebul|strong="H2083"\w* unto him, Where \add is\add* \w now|strong="H0645"\w* thy \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, wherewith thou \w saidst|strong="H0559"\w*, Who \add is\add* \w Abimelech|strong="H0040"\w*, that we should \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* him? \add is\add* not this the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that thou hast \w despised|strong="H3988"\w*? go \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, I pray \w now|strong="H4994"\w*, and \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* with them.

And \w Gaal|strong="H1603"\w* went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w men|strong="H1167"\w* of \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w*, and \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* with \w Abimelech|strong="H0040"\w*.

And \w Abimelech|strong="H0040"\w* \w chased|strong="H7291"\w* him, and he \w fled|strong="H5127"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him, and \w many|strong="H7227"\w* were \w overthrown|strong="H5307"\w* \add and\add* \w wounded|strong="H2491"\w*, \add even\add* unto the \w entering|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*.

And \w Abimelech|strong="H0040"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* at \w Arumah|strong="H0725"\w*: and \w Zebul|strong="H2083"\w* thrust \w out|strong="H1644"\w* \w Gaal|strong="H1603"\w* and his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, that they should not \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w*.

And it came to pass on the \w morrow|strong="H4283"\w*, that the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* into the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*; and they \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w Abimelech|strong="H0040"\w*.

And he \w took|strong="H3947"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and \w divided|strong="H2673"\w* them into \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w companies|strong="H7218"\w*, and laid \w wait|strong="H0693"\w* in the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, and \w looked|strong="H7200"\w*, and, behold, the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \add were\add* come \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*; and he rose \w up|strong="H6965"\w* against them, and \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* them.

And \w Abimelech|strong="H0040"\w*, and the \w company|strong="H7218"\w* that \add was\add* with him, rushed \w forward|strong="H6584"\w*, and \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* in the \w entering|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*: and the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \add other\add* \w companies|strong="H7218"\w* ran \w upon|strong="H6584"\w* all \add the people\add* that \add were\add* in the \w fields|strong="H7704"\w*, and \w slew|strong="H5221"\w* them.

And \w Abimelech|strong="H0040"\w* \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* against the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* all that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*; and he \w took|strong="H3920"\w* the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and \w slew|strong="H2026"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \add was\add* therein, and beat \w down|strong="H5422"\w* the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and \w sowed|strong="H2232"\w* it with \w salt|strong="H4417"\w*.

¶ And when all the \w men|strong="H1167"\w* of the \w tower|strong="H4026"\w* of \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \add that\add*, they \w entered|strong="H0935"\w* into an \w hold|strong="H6877"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \w god|strong="H0410"\w* \w Berith|strong="H1286"\w*.

And it was \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w Abimelech|strong="H0040"\w*, that all the \w men|strong="H1167"\w* of the \w tower|strong="H4026"\w* of \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w* were gathered \w together|strong="H6908"\w*.

And \w Abimelech|strong="H0040"\w* gat him \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Zalmon|strong="H6756"\w*, he and all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \add were\add* with him; and \w Abimelech|strong="H0040"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* an \w axe|strong="H7134"\w* in his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and cut \w down|strong="H3772"\w* a \w bough|strong="H7754"\w* from the \w trees|strong="H6086"\w*, and \w took|strong="H5375"\w* it, and \w laid|strong="H7760"\w* \add it\add* on his \w shoulder|strong="H7926"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \add were\add* with him, What ye have \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* me \w do|strong="H6213"\w*, make \w haste|strong="H4116"\w*, \add and\add* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* as \w I|strong="H3644"\w* \add have done\add*.\f + \fr 9.48 \ft me do: Heb. I have done\f*

And all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* likewise cut \w down|strong="H3772"\w* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* his \w bough|strong="H7754"\w*, and \w followed|strong="H3212"\w* \w Abimelech|strong="H0040"\w*, and \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \add them\add* to the \w hold|strong="H6877"\w*, and \w set|strong="H3341"\w* the \w hold|strong="H6877"\w* on \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* upon them; so that all the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of the \w tower|strong="H4026"\w* of \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w* also, about a \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* and \w women|strong="H0802"\w*.

¶ Then \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w Abimelech|strong="H0040"\w* to \w Thebez|strong="H8405"\w*, and \w encamped|strong="H2583"\w* against \w Thebez|strong="H8405"\w*, and \w took|strong="H3920"\w* it.

But there was a \w strong|strong="H5797"\w* \w tower|strong="H4026"\w* \w within|strong="H8432"\w* the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and thither \w fled|strong="H5127"\w* all the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* and \w women|strong="H0802"\w*, and all \w they|strong="H1167"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and \w shut|strong="H5462"\w* \add it\add* to them, and gat them \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to the \w top|strong="H1406"\w* of the \w tower|strong="H4026"\w*.

And \w Abimelech|strong="H0040"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* unto the \w tower|strong="H4026"\w*, and \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* against it, and went \w hard|strong="H5066"\w* unto the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w tower|strong="H4026"\w* to \w burn|strong="H8313"\w* it with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*.

And a \w certain|strong="H0259"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* a \w piece|strong="H6400"\w* of a \w millstone|strong="H7393"\w* upon \w Abimelech’s|strong="H0040"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, and all to \w brake|strong="H7533"\w* his \w skull|strong="H1538"\w*.

Then he \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w hastily|strong="H4120"\w* unto the young \w man|strong="H5288"\w* his \w armourbearer|strong="H5375"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, \w Draw|strong="H8025"\w* thy \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, and \w slay|strong="H4191"\w* me, that men \w say|strong="H0559"\w* not of me, A \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w slew|strong="H2026"\w* him. And his young \w man|strong="H5288"\w* thrust him \w through|strong="H1856"\w*, and he \w died|strong="H4191"\w*.

And when the \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* that \w Abimelech|strong="H0040"\w* was \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*, they \w departed|strong="H3212"\w* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* unto his \w place|strong="H4725"\w*.

¶ Thus \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w rendered|strong="H7725"\w* the \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w* of \w Abimelech|strong="H0040"\w*, which he \w did|strong="H6213"\w* unto his \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, in \w slaying|strong="H2026"\w* his \w seventy|strong="H7657"\w* \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*:

And all the \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* of the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w* did \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w render|strong="H7725"\w* upon their \w heads|strong="H7218"\w*: and upon them \w came|strong="H0935"\w* the \w curse|strong="H7045"\w* of \w Jotham|strong="H3147"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jerubbaal|strong="H3378"\w*.
